name: The Everflame
description:
Using the flame from your village, go deep into the labyrinthian depths to find the mythical Everflame. Returning to your village (via the staircase) will update your map (press M to see), but only if you return.

If your torch flame runs out (after 2 minutes) and you perish, your map will not be updated.

Pick up red gas cans to increase your torch duration and enter green teleporters to go back to the village instantly.

You can drop mini torches (left click) at the cost of your torch (10 seconds) to help return back to the village.

Good luck!

Music - Maestro Tlakaelel by Jesse Gallagher (YouTube Studio
